ADD_LIBRARY (glslang INTERFACE)

TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS (glslang INTERFACE "_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS")

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")

IF (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "debug")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/GenericCodeGend.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/glslang-default-resource-limitsd.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/glslangd.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/MachineIndependentd.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/SPIRV-Tools-optd.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/SPIRV-Toolsd.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/debug/SPIRVd.lib")
ELSEIF (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "release")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/GenericCodeGen.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/glslang-default-resource-limits.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/glslang.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/MachineIndependent.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/SPIRV-Tools-opt.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/SPIRV-Tools.lib")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (glslang INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/release/SPIRV.lib")
ELSE ()
	MESSAGE (FATAL_ERROR "Unknown build type: ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}")
ENDIF ()
